Posts.Content: Seapearl wrote: had a mammogram last Friday-results read as "dense asymmetry middle lateral right breast and separate partially visualized lobulated dense mass in the extreme posterior medial right breast". The recommendation is a diagnostic right mammogram and ultrasound. Should I be worried? Also said breast tissue was dense-51-75%-I'm just freaking out. I'm severely anemic-waiting to get my hemoglobin over 10 to have a hysterectomy and now this. If anyone has any information-would appreciate it!Â  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need help on test results-MD is out this week! Seapearl chrissyb
